title: Jana and the crowing hen
brief_description: Jana goes to stay with her grandparents on their farm when her mother becomes ill. Jana is suprised to find that her grandmother goes out to work while her grandfather stays at home. Useful in promoting discussions about sex-roles and stereotyping. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
